1.caption_en: A timeline diagram of the 5E lifecycle for a platform business (Ecosystemize, Explore, Embark, Embrace, Evolve) mapped to stages Strategy, Blueprint, Launch, Scale, and Growth. It highlights an initial strategy, a continuous-update strategy across middle phases, and an expansion strategy at the Evolve (super platform) stage.
1.caption_ru: A timeline diagram of the 5E lifecycle for a platform business (Ecosystemize, Explore, Embark, Embrace, Evolve) mapped to stages Strategy, Blueprint, Launch, Scale, and Growth. It highlights an initial strategy, a continuous-update strategy across middle phases, and an expansion strategy at the Evolve (super platform) stage.
